definition: needlework/working for a living as a needleworker
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The lonely patient derives pleasure from sewing.
sentences.chinese: 那個孤獨的病人從針線活兒裏獲得樂趣。
做針線活兒，她可是把好手。

sentences.english: Please carry on with your sewing. I'll tell you a story.
sentences.chinese: 繼續做針線活兒，我給你講個故事。

sentences.english: She often needles in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 她常在晚上做針線活兒。

sentences.english: My wife is terrific at any kind of sewing.
sentences.chinese: 我妻子做各種針線活兒都棒極了。
